data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Menu,
        Spacer,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Box palette="negative" padding="medium">
    <Menu.Container>
        <Menu.Heading>
            FEEDBACK
            <svelte:fragment slot="sub-menu">
                <Menu.Section>
                    <Menu.Button active>
                        Dot
                        <Spacer />
                        <Text is="span">ICON</Text>
                    </Menu.Button>

                    <Menu.Button>
                        Spinner
                        <Spacer />
                        <Text is="span">ICON</Text>
                    </Menu.Button>
                </Menu.Section>
            </svelte:fragment>
        </Menu.Heading>

        <Menu.Heading>
            OVERLAYS
            <svelte:fragment slot="sub-menu">
                <Menu.Section>
                    <Menu.Button>
                        Overlay
                        <Spacer />
                        <Text is="span">ICON</Text>
                    </Menu.Button>
                </Menu.Section>
            </svelte:fragment>
        </Menu.Heading>
    </Menu.Container>
</Box>
data.title: Menu Section
